pull.title: contrib: correct version check
pull.body:
[ not(major >= 3 and minor >= 4) ] fails for '4.0':

```Python
>>> major=4
>>> minor=0
>>> if not (major >= 3 and minor >= 5):
...     print('This example only works with Python 3.5 and greater')
...
This example only works with Python 3.5 and greater
```

events.message:
contrib: correct version check

[ not(major >= 3 and minor >= 4) ] fails for '4.0'

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -30,7 +30,7 @@
 import struct
 import sys
 
-if not (sys.version_info.major >= 3 and sys.version_info.minor >= 5):
+if not (sys.version_info.major > 3 or (sys.version_info.major == 3 and sys.version_info.minor >= 5)):

@@ -30,7 +30,7 @@
 import struct
 import sys
 
-if not (sys.version_info.major >= 3 and sys.version_info.minor >= 5):
+if not (sys.version_info.major > 3 or (sys.version_info.major == 3 and sys.version_info.minor >= 5)):
